Complaint #323

whitewhine:

“Talk quickly…you have NO IDEA how cold my iPhone gets in this weather.”

-Whine by Pete

Yesterday I woke up to moisture condensation on my iPhone. Guess it’s time to start sleeping with the heater on. Also, http://whitewhine.com/ is awesome.
